DescriptionData.Title: Bad Ass Classic Complete Set of Air Brush or Face Paint Stencils
DescriptionData.Description: Bad Ass Mini Stencils Complete Set includes 45 original stencil designs, which provides face paint artists with a wide selection of design options to choose from.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Thin, flexible Mylar stencils perfect for face and body painting
Work great to create intricate face paint details with a brush, sponge or airbrush
Set includes 5" x 3.5" oval shaped mini stencils in 45 original Bad Ass Designs - BAMS 1001-1045
Can be easily stored in a chain (included in the set)
